TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignInRequestMessage extends System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage

summary.span: Represents a WS-Federation Sign-In Request message.

span.span: Represents a WS-Federation Sign-In Request message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ws-federation 登录消息发送信赖方 (RP) 给安全令牌服务 (STS) 请求安全令牌。A WS-Federation sign-in message is sent by a relying party (RP) to a security token service (STS) to request a security token. Wa 参数必须设置为"wsignout1.0"并且 wtrealm 参数应设置为请求的资源 （这通常是请求的资源的 URL） 的安全领域。The wa parameter must be set to "wsignout1.0" and the wtrealm parameter should be set to the security realm of the requested resource (this is often the URL of the requested resource). 此外可以在请求中指定其他可选参数。Other optional parameters may also be specified in the request. A的静态方法通过创建消息类，例如方法，当 wa 参数设置为"wsignin1.0"，没有任何 wresult 或 wresultptr 参数存在和 wtrealm 参数或wreply 参数不存在。A message is created by the static methods of the class, for example the method, when the wa parameter is set to "wsignin1.0", there is no wresult or wresultptr parameter present, and either a wtrealm parameter or a wreply parameter is present. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对于与 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务 (AD FS) 版本 1.0 的向后兼容，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 允许 wtrealm 参数或要设置 wreply 参数 （或两者） 的登录消息被有效，则为但是，WS 联合身份验证协议要求 wtrealm 参数，会显示在登录请求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified. 类公开可用于设置或访问单个消息参数的多个属性。The class exposes several properties that can be used to set or access individual message parameters. 这些参数也可以设置或通过访问字典。These parameters can also be set or accessed through the dictionary. 例如，你可以读取消息中的 wtrealm 参数是属性或通过作为键与指定"wtrealm"字典。For example, you can read the wtrealm parameter in the message either through the property or by specifying "wtrealm" as the key to the dictionary. [!INCLUDE[wif_wsfed_ref](~/includes/wif-wsfed-ref-md.md)] ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifSignInMessage#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsigninmessage/cs/webapplication1/default.aspx.cs#2)]

summary.span: Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility.

span.span: Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wa 消息参数 (属性) 初始化为"wsignin1.0"。The wa message parameter (the property) is initialized to "wsignin1.0". 为了向后兼容支持非标准的消息创建。Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility. 在典型的情况下，必须指定 wtrealm 消息参数。In the typical case, a wtrealm message parameter must be specified. 此构造函数允许仅 wreply 消息参数指定为用于 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务 (AD FS) 版本 1.0 的向后兼容性。This constructor allows only a wreply message parameter to be specified for backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Service (AD FS) version 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AuthenticationType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AuthenticationType : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the wauth parameter of the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the wauth parameter of the message.
The authentication type.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wauth 参数就像在 WS 信任中定义的 wst:AuthenticationType 元素。The wauth parameter is like the wst:AuthenticationType element defined in WS-Trust. 值应设置为包含标识的使用的身份验证类型的 URI 的字符串。The value should be set to a string that contains a URI that identifies the type of authentication that is used. Wauth 参数是可选的。The wauth parameter is optional. 设置属性`null`或一个空字符串，以从消息中删除 wauth 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wauth parameter from the message.

exception.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wct 参数指定已创建的消息的时刻的当前时间。The wct parameter specifies the current time at the instant that the message was created. Wct 参数是可选的。The wct parameter is optional. 设置为属性`null`或一个空字符串，以从消息中删除 wct 参数。Set to the property `null` or an empty string to remove the wct parameter from the message.

This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wfed 参数指定的联合身份验证上下文的消息。The wfed parameter specifies the federation context for the message. Wfed 参数是可选的。The wfed parameter is optional. 设置为属性`null`或一个空字符串，以从消息中删除 wfed 参数。Set to the property `null` or an empty string to remove the wfed parameter from the message.

summary.span: Gets or sets the wfresh parameter of the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the wfresh parameter of the message.
The value of the wfresh parameter.

value.span: 这应该是一个整数，该整数表示为字符串。

span.span: This should be an integer represented as a string.

value.span: 它在身份验证都有效的几分钟内指定的最长时间。

span.span: It specifies the maximum age in minutes that the authentication is valid.

value.span: 零表示颁发的令牌之前，应提示用户。

span.span: Zero indicates that the user should be prompted before the token is issued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wfresh 参数指示以分钟为单位的身份验证都有效的最长时间。The wfresh parameter indicates the maximum age in minutes that the authentication is valid. Wfresh 参数是可选的。The wfresh parameter is optional. 设置属性`null`或一个空字符串，以从消息中删除 wfresh 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wfresh parameter from the message.

exception.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a string representation of an integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Whr 参数标识要用于请求的标识提供程序的安全领域。The whr parameter identifies the security realm of the identity provider to use for the request. 它可以指定为要使用 IP STS 的 URL 或被请求的接收方理解的标识符。It can be specified as the URL of the IP-STS to use or as an identifier that is understood by the receiver of the request. Whr 参数是可选的组属性`null`或一个空字符串，以从消息中删除 whr 参数。The whr parameter is optional Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the whr parameter from the message.

Wp 参数是可选的。The wp parameter is optional. 设置属性`null`或一个空字符串，以从消息中删除 wp 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wp parameter from the message.

summary.span: Gets or sets the wtrealm parameter of the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the wtrealm parameter of the message.
The value of the wtrealm parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wtrealm 参数指定与请求的资源所属的安全领域。The wtrealm parameter specifies the security realm to which the requested resource belongs. 这通常是资源的请求的 URL。This is often the URL of the requested resource. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对于与 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务 (AD FS) 版本 1.0 的向后兼容，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 允许 wtrealm 参数或要设置 wreply 参数 （或两者） 的登录消息被有效，则为但是，WS 联合身份验证协议要求 wtrealm 参数，会显示在登录请求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified. 设置属性`null`或一个空字符串，以从消息中删除 wtrealm 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wtrealm parameter from the message.

exception.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Reply { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Reply : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the wreply parameter of the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the wreply parameter of the message.
The value of the wreply parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含响应应定向到的 URI。Contains the URI to which responses should be directed. Wtrealm 参数通常用于指定此 URI。The wtrealm parameter is often used to specify this URI. 但是，在更复杂的情况下，可以使用 wtrealm 参数来指定请求，例如，整个网站的安全领域，wreply 参数可以用于指定该领域，例如，文档、 页上中的特定资源或终结点。However, in more complex scenarios, the wtrealm parameter can be used to specify the security realm for the request, for example, the entire web site, and the wreply parameter can be used to specify a specific resource within that realm, for example, a document, page, or endpoint. Wreply 参数是可选的。The wreply parameter is optional. 设置属性`null`或一个空字符串，以从消息中删除 wreply 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreply parameter from the message. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对于与 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务 (AD FS) 版本 1.0 的向后兼容，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 允许 wtrealm 参数或要设置 wreply 参数 （或两者） 的登录消息被有效，则为但是，WS 联合身份验证协议要求 wtrealm 参数，会显示在登录请求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wreq 参数指定使用的令牌请求``元素或完整的请求消息 WS 信任中所述。The wreq parameter specifies a token request using either a `` element or a full request message as described in WS-Trust. Wreq 参数是可选的。The wreq parameter is optional. 设置属性`null`或一个空字符串，以从消息中删除 wreq 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreq parameter from the message. 如果指定属性，则不能指定属性。If the property is specified, the property cannot be specified.
